mapper.insert: insert organization(id, name, status, oauth2_client_id) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{status}, #{oauth2ClientId})
mapper.update: update organization set status = 1 where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select a.id as 'organId', a.name as 'organName', a.oauth2_client_id as 'oauth2ClientId', b.id as 'authGroupId', b.name as 'authGroupName', c.name as 'authName', c.uri as 'authValue' from organization as a left join authority_group as b on b.organization_id = a.id left join authority as c on c.authority_group_id = b.id where b.id = #{authGroupId};

select a.id as 'organId', a.name as 'organName', a.oauth2_client_id as 'oauth2ClientId', b.id as 'authGroupId', b.name as 'authGroupName', c.name as 'authName', c.uri as 'authValue' from organization as a left join authority_group as b on b.organization_id = a.id left join authority as c on c.authority_group_id = b.id where b.id = #{authGroupId} and c.uri = #{authValue} and c.name = #{authName};
select name as city, id as code from organization;
